Name: Xenia
About the game: Xenia is a Metroidvania that takes place in Ancient Greece and allows you to control Ardas , a blacksmith who sees his city being rushed by evil forces. Queen Xenia is a real-life character, who lived in the 12th century b.c. Her castle was located at Ftheia plateau, Greece. According to the game’s plot, the evil wizard Skotos kidnapped the queen in order to use her blood to become powerful. After the royal army was sent to Troy in aid of King Achilles, Ardas has to accomplish a very difficult task. Save the queen at any cost. The game has been developed by only one person, Dimitris Floros, after 8 months of work. It’s a side-scrolling Metroidvania style Platform in which you collect gold and use it to buy items from the Magic shop. Xenia has 12 levels, 7 bosses and makes use of secret rooms and alternate endings, which increase the game’s replayability. Progress is being made by checkpoints and gameplay is fast-paced. Key Features - Metroidvania gameplay - 12 stages - 7 bosses - Secret rooms which hide treasures - Fast gameplay with checkpoints - Magic shop for spending the gold you earn - Alternative endings All future updates and DLC will be provided for free. For PR/Media requests send your emails to info@loresoft.gr Thank you for your support!
